name: Mortgage Insurance Homes in Urban Renewal Areas
objective: To help eligible entities to purchase and/or rehabilitate homes in urban renewal areas.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Housing -- Federal Housing Commissioner
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: 24, 220, Housing Act of 1954, Public Law 83-560, 12 U.S.C. 1715(b), 1715(k).. 12 U.S.C. § 1715b.

rules_regulations: Regulations are in 24 CFR 220.1.  The basic program instructions are in HUD Handbook 4555.1 - Rental Housing in Urban Renewal Areas for Project available on HUDclips.org.
